sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import logo from './images/logo.svg' import { FaBars } from 'react-icons/fa' import {useGlobalContext} from './context' const Navbar = () => { const {openSidebar,openSubmenu,closeSubmenu} = useGlobalContext() const displaySubmenu = (e)=>{ e.preventDefault() const page = e.target.textContent; const temp = e.target.getBoundingClientRect(); const center = (temp.left + temp.right)/2 const botton = temp.botton - 3 openSubmenu(page, {center, botton}) } return
} export default Navbar
